bio: Tadanori Yokoo (born in 1936) is a renowned Japanese graphic designer and visual artist known for his bold and colorful pop art style. He is recognized for his avant-garde posters and book covers, often featuring elements of traditional Japanese art, popular culture, and modern technology. Yokoo's Midjourney style is all about the striking use of color, playful imagery, and a sense of nostalgia and longing.
